Plot: 1960: the French intelligence service hires the 23-year-old André Merlaux. Handsome, well raised, intelligent but impressionable, Merlaux has much to learn to serve and defend the interests...
Title: Au service de la France
Writer: Jean-François Halin, Claire Lemaréchal, Jean-André Yerles
Actors: Hugo Becker, Wilfred Benaïche, Christophe Kourotchkine, Karim Barras
